Advisory.Description:
### Summary The EmbedVideo extension allows adding arbitrary attributes to an HTML element, allowing for stored XSS through wikitext. ### Details The attributes of an iframe are populated with the value of an unreserved data attribute (`data-iframeconfig`) that can be set via wikitext: https://github.com/StarCitizenWiki/mediawiki-extensions-EmbedVideo/blob/440fb331a84b2050f4cc084c1d31d58a1d1c202d/resources/ext.embedVideo.videolink.js#L5-L20 Similar code is also present here: https://github.com/StarCitizenWiki/mediawiki-extensions-EmbedVideo/blob/440fb331a84b2050f4cc084c1d31d58a1d1c202d/resources/modules/iframe.js#L139-L155 It is possible to execute JS through attributes like `onload` or `onmouseenter`. ### PoC 1. Create a page with the following contents: ```html
Click me!
``` 2. Click on the "Click me!" text 3. Click on the "Load video" button below ### Impact Arbitrary HTML can be inserted into the DOM by any user, allowing for JavaScript to be executed.
Advisory.Summary: Star Citizen  EmbedVideo Extension Stored XSS through wikitext caused by usage of non-reserved data attributes
